channel.title: Help please! What this command do? Keep items on death?

item.title: Help please! What this command do? Keep items on death?
item.dc:creator: @05bgoodson 05bgoodson
item.description:
@05bgoodson wrote:

when you die at rock crabs u lose all the stuff u had on you as it was real rs for example, how can i change this to make it so u tele to the death spawn point but keep stuff?

i want to know pretty much incase anyone misundertood top bit, how i can change the rock crab zone to allow me to keep items on death

There is also 2 other things i want to know…

1.what this command does? i haven’t noticed it change anything

if(command.startsWith("combat") && playerRights >= 2){ int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

  1. how can i change the point of where u come alive once you die?
    thnx alot if u can help[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 13, 2009, 05:02:00 am[/size][hr]14 replys and no answer? wow…

Read full topic
item.source: Help please! What this command do? Keep items on death?
